network.param

Interface IAttachment

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBulkFileImportConfig, IReceiptBulkFileImportConfig
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileBulkFileImportConfig, ReceiptDocumentFileBulkConfig

    public interface IAttachment
    An abstract representation of remote attachment/file.

    This interface will interact with remote files(AWS/Azure/Local file system) and provide an access for a data stream for reading file using this SDK.

    IAttachment defines four categories of operations:

    • Based on the config getFileContent will read the file content, if any error while reading this file it will return null, otherwise it will return bytebuffer.

    • Based on the config getSize will return the original file size in bytes. This method will be invoked at the time of file upload for checking original size and file buffer size getFileContent(). If both values are different it will throw exception.

    • Based on the config getLastModifiedDate will return file last modified date in bytes. This method will be invoked at the time reading/upload file content getFileContent() to the ParamNetwork

    • Based on the config getFileExtension will return file extension. This method will be invoked at the time reading/upload file content getFileContent() to the ParamNetwork

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jitendra Kumar Balla, ParamNetwork

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.nio.ByteBuffer getFileContent()
      Will return file content for setConfig(filePath).
      java.lang.String getFileExtension()
      Returns the file extension for a give config.
      java.lang.String getFileName()
      Returns the upload file name.
      long getLastModifiedDate()
      Returns the last modification date as a milliseconds for a give file.
      long getSize()
      Returns the size of the partition named by this abstract pathname.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileContent

        java.nio.ByteBuffer getFileContent()
        Will return file content for setConfig(filePath). Method will read the file content for a file config, if any exception while reading the file it will return null.
        Returns:
        ByteBuffer FileContent, FileContent might be null if any exception while reading the file.

      • getSize

        long getSize()
      throws FileNotFoundException
        Returns the size of the partition named by this abstract pathname.
        Returns:
        The size, in bytes, of the partition or 0L if this abstract pathname does not name a partition
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if this method unable to access file, then it will throw FileNotFoundException Exception

      • getLastModifiedDate

        long getLastModifiedDate()
                  throws FileNotFoundException
        Returns the last modification date as a milliseconds for a give file. It will throw an runtime error when method unable to access the file.
        Returns:
        Last modified time in milliseconds
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if this method unable to access file, then it will throw FileNotFoundException

      • getFileExtension

        java.lang.String getFileExtension()
        Returns the file extension for a give config. It will return empty string when file doesn't have any extension, Otherwise it will return extension.
        Returns:
        file extension

      • getFileName

        java.lang.String getFileName()
        Returns the upload file name. It will return null if file name is not exits, Otherwise it will return file name for an uploading resource.
        Returns:
        resource filename
